note: Enabling this allows you to monitor your device mode events in
For hybrid mode, these would be only your page calls
fields.label: Debug via DebugView

fields.note: Enabling this extends the set of properties automatically collected to include 'URL' and 'search'.  Note that GA4 has a limit on the number of unique properties per event name
fields.label: Include URL and Search as Page View properties

note: Override the gtag clientID & sessionID with Kepixel's to ensure attribution is properly unified across page and track events. We recommend turning on the override function. Otherwise, instrument your Kepixel SDK based on instructions
fields.label: Override gtag client ID & session ID

fields.label: Custom Domain URL

fields.note: Enter your GA4 Server Side Container URL
fields.label: Server Side Container URL

note: Enabling this sends events to GA4's validation server. This allows you to check validation responses in Live Events, but note that

note.text: these events will not show up in reports.

note: For hybrid mode, these would be your track and group calls
fields.label: Debug via Validation Server

fields.note: Use this field to filter sensitive PII fields like email, phone number, credit card number, etc. from your events and prevent them from being sent to GA4
fields.label: Filter user traits

fields.note: This will send all of your identify calls to Mixpanel's People feature.
fields.label: Use Mixpanel People

fields.note: While this is checked, our integration automatically sets all traits on identify calls as super properties and people properties if Mixpanel People is checked as well.
fields.label: Automatically set all Traits as Super Properties and People Properties

fields.note: If enabled, Mixpanel will ignore "Do Not Track" setting of browser
fields.label: Ignore "Do Not Track"

fields.note: This will track Loaded a Page events to Mixpanel for all page method calls. We enable this by default as it's how Mixpanel suggests sending these calls.
fields.label: Track All Pages to Mixpanel with a Consolidated Event Name

fields.note: This will track events to Mixpanel for page method calls that have a category associated with them. For example page('Docs', 'Index') would translate to Viewed Docs Index Page.
fields.label: Track Categorized Pages to Mixpanel

fields.note: This will track events to Mixpanel for page method calls that have a name associated with them. For example page('Signup') would translate to Viewed Signup Page.
fields.label: Track Named Pages to Mixpanel

fields.note: This value, if it's not blank, will be sent as kepixel_source_name to Mixpanel for every event/page/screen call.
fields.label: Source Name

fields.note: This value, if it's not zero, will be sent as record_sessions_percent to Mixpanel for every event/page/screen call.
fields.label: Percentage of SDK initializations that will qualify for replay data capture

fields.note: This will allow the Mixpanel cookie to persist between different pages of your application.
fields.label: Cross Subdomain Cookie

fields.note: Choose the persistence type for Mixpanel cookie. If 'Local Storage' is selected, then any existing Mixpanel cookie value with the same persistence name will be transferred to 'Local Storage' and deleted.
fields.label: Persistence Type

fields.note: Enter a persistence name for the Mixpanel cookie.
fields.label: Persistence Name

fields.note: This will mark the Mixpanel cookie as secure, meaning it will only be transmitted over https
fields.label: Secure Cookie

fields.label: Profile ID
fields.footerNote: User profile ID associated with request.
fields.regexErrorMessage: Length of Profile ID must be below 50 characters.

fields.label: Limit ad tracking
fields.footerNote: When set to true, the conversion will be used for reporting but not targeting. This will prevent remarketing.

fields.label: Child directed treatment
fields.footerNote: Whether this particular request may come from a user under the age of 13, under COPPA compliance.

fields.label: Non personalized ad
fields.footerNote: Whether the conversion was for a non personalized ad.

fields.label: Treatment for underage
fields.footerNote: Whether this particular request may come from a user under the age of 16 (may differ by country), under compliance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

fields.label: Enhanced Conversions
fields.footerNote: Enable this toggle to enhanced the conversions.

fields.label: Hash user identifiers
fields.footerNote: Kepixel will hash your user identifiers by default. Switch this off if you are already sending hashed data.

fields.label: Map Rudder Properties to Salesforce Properties
Use contactId for converted leads
fields.footerNote: It is suggested to enable this option when both lead and contact field mappings are same.

fields.label: API Key
fields.footerNote: Your API Key

fields.label: Sign Up Source Id
fields.footerNote: Your Sign Up Source Id

fields.label: Enable New Identify Flow (Beta)
fields.footerNote: Use Kepixel's new identify flow for better user management. When enabled, identify calls will sync user data using Attentive's Identity and Custom Attributes APIs. When disabled, uses the legacy subscription flow.
